lines.text: Because I love you. And if you come back with me to the hospital and fight for us. Fight for us, I will never leave you Victor. But you have to fight. And if you get well, when you get well, I'll be there with you. And if you die, I will hold your hand. I'll hold your hand and the last thing you will ever see will be me because I love you.
That's all this redhead could find. There's no real food in the house. Unless you want a Twinkie omelet.
And may I assume from the intense odor of mayonnaise you'll be dining in tonight?
Uh, actually, no, we're going out, right, honey?

[to Hilary]
Call me insane, but I'd venture a guess that Gordon would like to warm you up in any way possible.
My mother said, "You don't have to like everything, but you have to try everything."
Oh, my mother always said, "Pass the Velveeta."
Then I'll take care of you.
I told Estelle you have a terminal disease.
So how much is he paying you?
